label: Clause
comment: A distinct article or provision in a contract, treaty, will, or other formal or legal written document, which requires compliance.

datatypeProperties.comment: Content, expressed as text, of this document clause.
The unique identifier of this document clause.
The Uniform Resource Locator (URL) for this document clause.

objectProperties.comment: A measurement associated with this document clause.
A period of time associated with this document clause.

referencedBy.comment: A document clause included in this document authentication.
